name: Deathbringer Stance
ratio: deals bonus magic damage and heals him, based on the target's max health
rawDesc: Periodically, Aatrox's next basic attack deals bonus magic damage and heals him, based on the target's max health.

name: The Darkin Blade
ratio: dealing physical damage
rawDesc: Aatrox slams his greatsword down, dealing physical damage. He can swing three times, each with a different area of effect.

name: Infernal Chains
ratio: dealing damage to the first enemy hit
rawDesc: Aatrox smashes the ground, dealing damage to the first enemy hit. Champions and large monsters have to leave the impact area quickly or they will be dragged to the center and take the damage again.

name: Umbral Dash
ratio: Passively, Aatrox heals when damaging enemy champions. On activation, he dashes in a direction.
rawDesc: Passively, Aatrox heals when damaging enemy champions. On activation, he dashes in a direction.

name: World Ender
ratio: damage, increased healing, and Move Speed
rawDesc: Aatrox unleashes his demonic form, fearing nearby enemy minions and gaining attack damage, increased healing, and Move Speed. If he gets a takedown, this effect is extended.

name: Essence Theft
ratio: After killing 9 minions or monsters, Ahri heals. After taking down an enemy champion, Ahri heals for…
rawDesc: After killing 9 minions or monsters, Ahri heals. After taking down an enemy champion, Ahri heals for a greater amount.

name: Orb of Deception
ratio: dealing magic damage on the way out and true damage on the way back
rawDesc: Ahri sends out and pulls back her orb, dealing magic damage on the way out and true damage on the way back.

name: Fox-Fire
ratio: Ahri gains a brief burst of Move Speed and releases three fox-fires, that lock onto and attack nearb…
rawDesc: Ahri gains a brief burst of Move Speed and releases three fox-fires, that lock onto and attack nearby enemies.

name: Charm
ratio: damages and charms an enemy it encounters, instantly stopping movement abilities and causing them to walk harmlessly tow
rawDesc: Ahri blows a kiss that damages and charms an enemy it encounters, instantly stopping movement abilities and causing them to walk harmlessly towards her.

name: Spirit Rush
ratio: Ahri dashes forward and fires essence bolts, damaging nearby enemies. Spirit Rush can be cast up to …
rawDesc: Ahri dashes forward and fires essence bolts, damaging nearby enemies. Spirit Rush can be cast up to three times before going on cooldown, and gains additional recasts when taking down enemy champions.

name: Assassin's Mark
ratio: Dealing spell damage to a champion creates a ring of energy around them
rawDesc: Dealing spell damage to a champion creates a ring of energy around them. Exiting that ring empowers Akali's next Attack with bonus range and damage.

name: Five Point Strike
ratio: dealing damage based on her bonus Attack Damage and Ability Power and slowing
rawDesc: Akali throws out five kunai, dealing damage based on her bonus Attack Damage and Ability Power and slowing.

name: Twilight Shroud
ratio: Akali drops a cover of smoke and briefly gains Move Speed. While inside the shroud, Akali becomes in…
rawDesc: Akali drops a cover of smoke and briefly gains Move Speed. While inside the shroud, Akali becomes invisible and unable to be selected by enemy spells and attacks. Attacking or using abilities will briefly reveal her.

name: Shuriken Flip
ratio: dealing magic damage
rawDesc: Flip backward and fire a shuriken forward, dealing magic damage. The first enemy or smoke cloud hit is marked. Re-cast to dash to the marked target, dealing additional damage.

name: Perfect Execution
ratio: Akali leaps in a direction, damaging enemies she strikes. Re-cast: Akali dashes in a direction, exec…
rawDesc: Akali leaps in a direction, damaging enemies she strikes. Re-cast: Akali dashes in a direction, executing all enemies she strikes.

name: Dirty Fighting
ratio: deals bonus damage and grants him a Shield if the target was a champion
rawDesc: Every three hits from Akshan's Attacks and Abilities deals bonus damage and grants him a Shield if the target was a champion. When Akshan Attacks, he fires an additional Attack for reduced damage. If he cancels the additional Attack, he instead gains Move Speed.

name: Avengerang
ratio: deals damage going out and coming back, extending its range each time it hits an enemy
rawDesc: Akshan throws a boomerang that deals damage going out and coming back, extending its range each time it hits an enemy.

name: Going Rogue
ratio: Akshan passively marks enemy champions as Scoundrels when they kill his ally champions. If Akshan ki…
rawDesc: Akshan passively marks enemy champions as Scoundrels when they kill his ally champions. If Akshan kills a Scoundrel, he resurrects the allies they killed, gains bonus gold, and clears all marks. When activated, Akshan enters camouflage and gains Move Speed and Mana Regen while moving towards Scoundrels. Akshan loses the camouflage quickly while he is not in brush or near terrain.

name: Heroic Swing
ratio: Akshan fires a grappling hook into terrain then swings around it, repeatedly firing at the nearest e…
rawDesc: Akshan fires a grappling hook into terrain then swings around it, repeatedly firing at the nearest enemy while swinging. He can jump off early or gets knocked off when colliding with champions or terrain.

name: Comeuppance
ratio: dealing damage based on missing health to the first champion, minion, or structure hit
rawDesc: Akshan locks onto an enemy champion and starts storing bullets. When released, he fires all stored bullets, dealing damage based on missing health to the first champion, minion, or structure hit.

name: Triumphant Roar
ratio: Alistar charges his roar by stunning or displacing enemy champions or when nearby enemies die. When …
rawDesc: Alistar charges his roar by stunning or displacing enemy champions or when nearby enemies die. When fully charged he heals himself all nearby allied champions.

name: Pulverize
ratio: dealing damage to nearby enemies and tossing them into the air
rawDesc: Alistar smashes the ground, dealing damage to nearby enemies and tossing them into the air.

name: Headbutt
ratio: dealing damage and knocking the target back
rawDesc: Alistar rams a target with his head, dealing damage and knocking the target back.

name: Trample
ratio: damages an enemy champion
rawDesc: Alistar tramples nearby enemy units, ignoring unit collision and gaining stacks if he damages an enemy champion. At full stacks Alistar's next basic attack against an enemy champion deals additional magic damage and stuns them.

name: Unbreakable Will
ratio: damage for the duration
rawDesc: Alistar lets out a wild roar, removing all crowd control effects on himself, and reducing incoming physical and magical damage for the duration.

name: Drakehound's Step
ratio: damage, and attack speed, and refunding energy
rawDesc: Entering an attack or movement command while casting an ability will cause Ambessa to dash a short distance once the ability is cast, granting her next attack bonus range, damage, and attack speed, and refunding energy.

name: Cunning Sweep / Sundering Slam
ratio: dealing bonus damage to enemies hit by the blades
rawDesc: Ambessa sweeps her twin drakehounds in a semicircle in front of her, dealing bonus damage to enemies hit by the blades. Striking an enemy will transform the next cast of this ability for a short period of time, causing her to slam her twin drakehounds down in a line in front of her, dealing bonus damage to the first enemy hit.

name: Repudiation
ratio: damage nearby enemies
rawDesc: Ambessa gains a shield, briefly braces herself, and then slams the ground to damage nearby enemies. If she blocked any non-minion damage while bracing herself, this ability will deal increased damage.

name: Lacerate
ratio: Ambessa whips her twin drakehounds around herself, damaging and slowing nearby enemies. Initiating D…
rawDesc: Ambessa whips her twin drakehounds around herself, damaging and slowing nearby enemies. Initiating Drakehound's Step from this ability causes her to strike a second time at the end of its dash.

name: Public Execution
ratio: damage and are stunned
rawDesc: Ambessa blinks to the farthest enemy champion in a line of her choosing and suppresses them upon her arrival. She then slams the enemy into the ground where they take damage and are stunned.

name: Cursed Touch
ratio: damage from incoming magic damage
rawDesc: Amumu's basic attacks Curse his enemies, causing them to take bonus true damage from incoming magic damage.

name: Bandage Toss
ratio: Amumu tosses a sticky bandage at a target, stunning and damaging the target while he pulls himself t…
rawDesc: Amumu tosses a sticky bandage at a target, stunning and damaging the target while he pulls himself to them.

name: Despair
ratio: Overcome by anguish, nearby enemies lose a percentage of their maximum Health each second and have t…
rawDesc: Overcome by anguish, nearby enemies lose a percentage of their maximum Health each second and have their Curses refreshed.

name: Tantrum
ratio: damage Amumu would take
rawDesc: Permanently reduces the physical damage Amumu would take. Amumu can unleash his rage, dealing damage to surrounding enemies. Each time Amumu is hit, the cooldown on Tantrum is reduced.

name: Curse of the Sad Mummy
ratio: Amumu entangles surrounding enemy units in bandages, applying his Curse, damaging and stunning them.
rawDesc: Amumu entangles surrounding enemy units in bandages, applying his Curse, damaging and stunning them.

name: Rebirth
ratio: damage, Anivia reverts to an egg and is reborn with full health
rawDesc: Upon taking fatal damage, Anivia reverts to an egg and is reborn with full health.

name: Flash Frost
ratio: damage in a radius, stunning anyone in the area
rawDesc: Anivia brings her wings together and summons a sphere of ice that flies towards her opponents, chilling and damaging anyone in its path. When the sphere explodes it does moderate damage in a radius, stunning anyone in the area.

name: Crystallize
ratio: Anivia condenses the moisture in the air into an impassable wall of ice to block all movement. The w…
rawDesc: Anivia condenses the moisture in the air into an impassable wall of ice to block all movement. The wall only lasts a short duration before it melts.

name: Frostbite
ratio: dealing damage
rawDesc: With a flap of her wings, Anivia blasts a freezing gust of wind at her target, dealing damage. If the target was recently hit by Flash Frost or damaged by a fully formed Glacial Storm, the damage they take is doubled.

name: Glacial Storm
ratio: damage her enemies and slow their advance
rawDesc: Anivia summons a driving rain of ice and hail to damage her enemies and slow their advance.

name: Pyromania
ratio: After casting 4 spells, Annie's next offensive spell will stun the target. Annie begins the game and…
rawDesc: After casting 4 spells, Annie's next offensive spell will stun the target. Annie begins the game and respawns with Pyromania available.

name: Disintegrate
ratio: dealing damage and refunding the Mana cost if it destroys the target
rawDesc: Annie hurls a Mana infused fireball, dealing damage and refunding the Mana cost if it destroys the target.

name: Incinerate
ratio: dealing damage to all enemies in the area
rawDesc: Annie casts a blazing cone of fire, dealing damage to all enemies in the area.

name: Molten Shield
ratio: damages enemies who strike her with attacks or spells
rawDesc: Grants Annie or an ally a shield, a burst of Move Speed, and damages enemies who strike her with attacks or spells.

name: Summon: Tibbers
ratio: dealing damage to units in the area
rawDesc: Annie wills her bear Tibbers to life, dealing damage to units in the area. Tibbers can attack and also burns enemies that stand near him.

name: The Hitman and the Seer
ratio: Aphelios wields 5 Lunari Weapons made by his sister Alune. He has access to two at a time: one main-…
rawDesc: Aphelios wields 5 Lunari Weapons made by his sister Alune. He has access to two at a time: one main-hand and one off-hand. Each weapon has a unique Basic Attack and Ability. Attacks and abilities consume a weapon's ammo. When out of ammo, Aphelios discards the weapon and Alune summons the next of the 5.

name: Weapon Abilites
ratio: Aphelios has 5 different activated abilities, based on his main-hand weapon: Calibrum (Rifle): Long …
rawDesc: Aphelios has 5 different activated abilities, based on his main-hand weapon: Calibrum (Rifle): Long range shot that marks its target for a long-range follow-up attack. Severum (Scythe Pistol): Run fast while attacking nearby enemies with both weapons. Gravitum (Cannon): Root all enemies slowed by this weapon. Infernum (Flamethrower): Blast enemies in a cone and attack them with your off-hand weapon. Crescendum (Chakram): Deploy a sentry that shoots your off-hand weapon.

name: Phase
ratio: Aphelios swaps his main-hand gun with his off-hand gun, replacing his basic attack and activated abi…
rawDesc: Aphelios swaps his main-hand gun with his off-hand gun, replacing his basic attack and activated ability.

name: Weapon Queue System
ratio: Aphelios has no third ability. This slot shows the next weapon Alune will give him. Weapon order beg…
rawDesc: Aphelios has no third ability. This slot shows the next weapon Alune will give him. Weapon order begins fixed but may change over game time -- when a weapon is out of ammo it goes to the end of the order.

name: Moonlight Vigil
ratio: Fire a concentrated blast of moonlight that explodes on enemy champions. Applies the unique effect o…
rawDesc: Fire a concentrated blast of moonlight that explodes on enemy champions. Applies the unique effect of Aphelios' main-hand gun.

name: Frost Shot
ratio: deal increased damage to these targets
rawDesc: Ashe's attacks slow their target, causing her to deal increased damage to these targets. Ashe's critical strikes deal no bonus damage but apply an empowered slow to the target.

name: Ranger's Focus
ratio: Ashe builds up Focus by attacking. At maximum Focus, Ashe can cast Ranger's Focus to consume all sta…
rawDesc: Ashe builds up Focus by attacking. At maximum Focus, Ashe can cast Ranger's Focus to consume all stacks of Focus, temporarily increasing her Attack Speed and transforming her basic attack into a powerful flurry attack for the duration.

name: Volley
ratio: damage
rawDesc: Ashe fires arrows in a cone for increased damage. Also applies Frost Shot.

name: Hawkshot
ratio: Ashe sends her Hawk Spirit on a scouting mission anywhere on the map.
rawDesc: Ashe sends her Hawk Spirit on a scouting mission anywhere on the map.

name: Enchanted Crystal Arrow
ratio: deals damage and stuns the Champion, stunning for longer the farther arrow has traveled
rawDesc: Ashe fires a missile of ice in a straight line. If the arrow collides with an enemy Champion, it deals damage and stuns the Champion, stunning for longer the farther arrow has traveled. In addition, surrounding enemy units take damage and are slowed.

name: Cosmic Creator
ratio: Aurelion Sol's damaging Abilities break down enemies into stacks of Stardust, which permanently impr…
rawDesc: Aurelion Sol's damaging Abilities break down enemies into stacks of Stardust, which permanently improves each of his abilities.

name: Breath of Light
ratio: damage onto nearby enemies
rawDesc: Aurelion Sol channels his dragon breath for a few seconds, damaging the first enemy hit and splashing reduced damage onto nearby enemies. Each second the breath is channeled directly at an enemy will deal bonus damage, which is improved by the amount of Stardust that's been collected. This ability collects Stardust if the target is a champion.

name: Astral Flight
ratio: deals increased damage while flying
rawDesc: Aurelion Sol flies over terrain in a targeted direction. While in this state, he can cast other abilities. Breath of Light no longer has a cooldown or maximum channel duration and deals increased damage while flying. Astral Flight's remaining cooldown is reduced whenever an enemy champion dies after being recently damaged by Aurelion Sol. Stardust increases Astral Flight's maximum range.

name: Singularity
ratio: Aurelion Sol summons a black hole, damaging enemies and slowly pulling them toward its center. This …
rawDesc: Aurelion Sol summons a black hole, damaging enemies and slowly pulling them toward its center. This ability grants Stardust each time an enemy dies within the black hole and for each second an enemy champion is caught inside it. The center of the black hole executes enemies who are below a certain percentage of their maximum health. Stardust increases Singularity's area as well as the execution threshold.

name: Falling Star / The Skies Descend
ratio: deals magic damage and stuns enemies while also granting Stardust for each enemy champion it hits
rawDesc: Falling Star: Aurelion Sol crashes a star into the earth. This impact deals magic damage and stuns enemies while also granting Stardust for each enemy champion it hits. Gathering enough Stardust transforms Aurelion Sol's next Falling Star into The Skies Descend. The Skies Descend: Aurelion Sol drags a giant star down from the heavens with an increased impact zone and increased damage, knocking up enemies rather than stunning them. A shockwave then spreads from the edge of the impact zone, which damages and slows the enemies it hits. Stardust increases the impact area of both Falling Star and The Skies Descend.

name: Spirit Abjuration
ratio: damages
rawDesc: Aurora's spells and attacks exorcise spirits from the enemies she damages. Exorcised spirits follow Aurora around and heal her.

name: Twofold Hex
ratio: Aurora sends out a missile that curses any enemies it hits. She can then recast the ability to draw …
rawDesc: Aurora sends out a missile that curses any enemies it hits. She can then recast the ability to draw active curses back toward herself, damaging foes who are hit along the way.

name: Across the Veil
ratio: Aurora leaps in a direction of her choosing, entering the spirit realm upon landing, becoming invisi…
rawDesc: Aurora leaps in a direction of her choosing, entering the spirit realm upon landing, becoming invisible, and gaining Move Speed for a short duration of time.

name: The Weirding
ratio: damages and slows enemies before Aurora hops backward to safety
rawDesc: Aurora converges the realms, sending out a blast of spirit magic that damages and slows enemies before Aurora hops backward to safety.

name: Between Worlds
ratio: damages and slows any enemies it hits
rawDesc: Aurora leaps in a direction of her choosing, releasing a shockwave that damages and slows any enemies it hits. Afterward, she creates an area that slows enemies within it and allows Aurora to teleport from one side of the area to the other.

name: Shurima's Legacy
ratio: Azir can summon the Disc of the Sun from the ruins of allied or enemy turrets.
rawDesc: Azir can summon the Disc of the Sun from the ruins of allied or enemy turrets.

name: Conquering Sands
ratio: deal magic damage to enemies they pass through and apply a slow for 1 second
rawDesc: Azir sends all Sand Soldiers towards a location. Sand Soldiers deal magic damage to enemies they pass through and apply a slow for 1 second.

name: Arise!
ratio: deal magic damage to enemies in a line
rawDesc: Azir summons a Sand Soldier to attack nearby targets for him, replacing his basic attack against targets within the soldier's range. Their attacks deal magic damage to enemies in a line.

name: Shifting Sands
ratio: Azir shields himself briefly and dashes to one of his Sand Soldiers, damaging enemies. If he hits an…
rawDesc: Azir shields himself briefly and dashes to one of his Sand Soldiers, damaging enemies. If he hits an enemy champion, he instantly readies a new Sand Soldier for deployment and halts his dash.

name: Emperor's Divide
ratio: Azir summons a wall of soldiers which charge forward, knocking back and damaging enemies.
rawDesc: Azir summons a wall of soldiers which charge forward, knocking back and damaging enemies.

name: Traveler's Call
ratio: deal extra magic damage
rawDesc: Meeps: Bard attracts lesser spirits that assist with his basic attacks to deal extra magic damage. When Bard has collected enough Chimes, his meeps will also deal damage in an area and slow enemies hit. Chimes: Ancient chimes randomly appear for Bard to collect. These grant experience, restore mana, and provide out of combat Move Speed.

name: Cosmic Binding
ratio: Bard fires a missile which will slow the first enemy struck, and continue onward. If it strikes a wa…
rawDesc: Bard fires a missile which will slow the first enemy struck, and continue onward. If it strikes a wall, it will stun the initial target; if it strikes another enemy, it will stun them both.

name: Caretaker's Shrine
ratio: Reveals a Health shrine which powers up over a short time, disappearing after healing and speeding u…
rawDesc: Reveals a Health shrine which powers up over a short time, disappearing after healing and speeding up the first ally that touches it.

name: Magical Journey
ratio: Bard opens a portal in nearby terrain. Allies and enemies alike can take a one-way trip through that…
rawDesc: Bard opens a portal in nearby terrain. Allies and enemies alike can take a one-way trip through that terrain by moving into the portal.

name: Tempered Fate
ratio: Bard sends spirit energy arcing to a location, putting all champions, minions, monsters, and turrets…
rawDesc: Bard sends spirit energy arcing to a location, putting all champions, minions, monsters, and turrets hit into stasis for a brief time.

name: Death in Lavender
ratio: Bel'Veth gains permanent attack speed stacks after taking down large minions and monsters and champi…
rawDesc: Bel'Veth gains permanent attack speed stacks after taking down large minions and monsters and champions. She also gains temporary bonus attack speed after using an ability.

name: Void Surge
ratio: damages all enemies she passes through
rawDesc: Bel'Veth dashes in a chosen direction and damages all enemies she passes through.

name: Above and Below
ratio: Bel'Veth slams her tail to the ground, damaging, knocking up, and slowing her enemies.
rawDesc: Bel'Veth slams her tail to the ground, damaging, knocking up, and slowing her enemies.

name: Royal Maelstrom
ratio: damage reduction
rawDesc: Bel'Veth roots herself in place, channeling a storm of slashes around her that targets the lowest-health enemy and grants her lifesteal and damage reduction.

name: Endless Banquet
ratio: Bel'Veth consumes Void coral remnants, transforming into her true form and increasing her max health…
rawDesc: Bel'Veth consumes Void coral remnants, transforming into her true form and increasing her max health, attack range, attack speed, and out-of-combat move speed. Consuming the Void coral remnants of a Void epic monster will grant her a longer ultimate duration, as well as the power to summon Void remora.

name: Mana Barrier
ratio: Blitzcrank gains a shield based on their mana when dropping to low health.
rawDesc: Blitzcrank gains a shield based on their mana when dropping to low health.

name: Rocket Grab
ratio: dealing damage and dragging it back to them
rawDesc: Blitzcrank fires their right hand to grab an opponent on its path, dealing damage and dragging it back to them.

name: Overdrive
ratio: Blitzcrank super charges themself to get dramatically increased Move and Attack Speed. They are temp…
rawDesc: Blitzcrank super charges themself to get dramatically increased Move and Attack Speed. They are temporarily slowed after the effect ends.

name: Power Fist
ratio: deal double damage and pop their target up in the air
rawDesc: Blitzcrank charges up their fist to make the next attack deal double damage and pop their target up in the air.

name: Static Field
ratio: damage after 1 second
rawDesc: Enemies attacked by Blitzcrank are marked and take lightning damage after 1 second. Additionally, Blitzcrank can activate this ability to remove nearby enemies' shields, damage them, and silence them briefly.

name: Blaze
ratio: dealing damage over 4 seconds, stacking up to 3 times
rawDesc: Brand's spells light his targets ablaze, dealing damage over 4 seconds, stacking up to 3 times. If Brand kills an enemy while it is ablaze he regains mana. When Blaze reaches max stacks on a Champion or large monster, it becomes unstable. It detonates in 2 seconds, applying spell effects and dealing massive damage in an area around the victim.

name: Sear
ratio: deals magic damage
rawDesc: Brand launches a ball of fire forward that deals magic damage. If the target is ablaze, Sear will stun the target.

name: Pillar of Flame
ratio: dealing magic damage to enemy units within the area
rawDesc: After a short delay, Brand creates a Pillar of Flame at a target area, dealing magic damage to enemy units within the area. Units that are ablaze take an additional 25% damage.

name: Conflagration
ratio: dealing magic damage
rawDesc: Brand conjures a powerful blast at his target that spreads to nearby enemies, dealing magic damage. If the target is ablaze, Conflagration's spread is doubled.

name: Pyroclasm
ratio: dealing magic damage to enemies each time bounce
rawDesc: Brand unleashes a devastating torrent of fire that bounces up to 5 times off of Brand and nearby enemies, dealing magic damage to enemies each time bounce. Bounces prioritize stacking Blaze to max on Champions. If a target is ablaze, Pyroclasm will briefly slow them.

name: Concussive Blows
ratio: damage
rawDesc: Braum's basic attacks apply Concussive Blows. Once the first stack is applied, ally basic attacks also stack Concussive Blows. Upon reaching 4 stacks, the target is stunned and takes magic damage. For the next few seconds they cannot receive new stacks, but take bonus magic damage from Braum's attacks.

name: Winter's Bite
ratio: dealing magic damage
rawDesc: Braum propels freezing ice from his shield, slowing and dealing magic damage. Applies a stack of Concussive Blows.

name: Stand Behind Me
ratio: Braum leaps to a target allied champion or minion. On arrival, Braum and the ally gain Armor and Mag…
rawDesc: Braum leaps to a target allied champion or minion. On arrival, Braum and the ally gain Armor and Magic Resist for a few seconds.

name: Unbreakable
ratio: damage of the first attack completely and reduces the damage of all subsequent attacks from this direction
rawDesc: Braum raises his shield in a direction for several seconds, intercepting all projectiles causing them to hit him and be destroyed. He negates the damage of the first attack completely and reduces the damage of all subsequent attacks from this direction.

name: Glacial Fissure
ratio: Braum slams the ground, knocking up enemies nearby and in a line in front of him. A fissure is left …
rawDesc: Braum slams the ground, knocking up enemies nearby and in a line in front of him. A fissure is left along the line that slows enemies.

name: Crimson Curse
ratio: damage it deals
rawDesc: Briar's attacks and abilities apply a stacking bleed that heals her for a portion of the damage it deals. Perpetually hungry, she gains increased healing based on her missing Health, but lacks innate Health Regeneration.

name: Head Rush
ratio: Briar leaps to a unit and hits enemies with The Heel Wheel (of Pain), stunning them and breaking the…
rawDesc: Briar leaps to a unit and hits enemies with The Heel Wheel (of Pain), stunning them and breaking their Armor.

name: Blood Frenzy / Snack Attack
ratio: deal damage in an area around her target
rawDesc: Briar leaps forward and shatters her pillory, entering a Blood Frenzy that causes her to relentlessly pursue the nearest enemy (prioritizing champions). While frenzied, she gains increased Attack Speed and Move Speed, and her attacks deal damage in an area around her target. Briar can reactivate this ability while frenzied to take a CHOMP out of her target on her next attack, dealing additional damage based on their missing Health, and healing Briar based on the damage she deals.

name: Chilling Scream
ratio: damages and slows enemies
rawDesc: Briar refocuses her mind, removing Blood Frenzy and channeling energy into a powerful scream that damages and slows enemies. While charging, she takes reduced damage and heals for a portion of her max Health. A fully charged scream knocks foes back, dealing additional damage and stunning those who collide with a wall.

name: Certain Death
ratio: Briar kicks her pillory's hemolith gemstone, marking the first champion it hits as her prey. She the…
rawDesc: Briar kicks her pillory's hemolith gemstone, marking the first champion it hits as her prey. She then beelines straight to them, fearing other surrounding enemies upon arriving at her target, and enters a state of complete hemomania. She will pursue her prey until death, gaining the benefits of Blood Frenzy as well as additional Armor, Magic Resistance, Life Steal, and Move Speed.

name: Headshot
ratio: dealing bonus damage that scales with her critical strike chance
rawDesc: Every few basic attacks, or against a target she has trapped or netted, Caitlyn will fire a headshot dealing bonus damage that scales with her critical strike chance. On trapped or netted targets, Caitlyn's Headshot attack range is doubled.

name: Piltover Peacemaker
ratio: deals physical damage (deals less damage to subsequent targets)
rawDesc: Caitlyn revs up her rifle for 1 second to unleash a penetrating shot that deals physical damage (deals less damage to subsequent targets).

name: Yordle Snap Trap
ratio: Caitlyn sets a trap that, when sprung, reveals and immobilizes the enemy champion for 1.5 seconds, g…
rawDesc: Caitlyn sets a trap that, when sprung, reveals and immobilizes the enemy champion for 1.5 seconds, granting Caitlyn an empowered Headshot.

name: 90 Caliber Net
ratio: Caitlyn fires a heavy net to slow her target. The recoil knocks Caitlyn back.
rawDesc: Caitlyn fires a heavy net to slow her target. The recoil knocks Caitlyn back.

name: Ace in the Hole
ratio: dealing massive damage to a single target at a huge range
rawDesc: Caitlyn takes time to line up the perfect shot, dealing massive damage to a single target at a huge range. Enemy champions can intercept the bullet for their ally.

name: Adaptive Defenses
ratio: damage type (Physical or Magic) for a brief duration
rawDesc: Basic attacks on champions grant a shield equal to a percentage of Camille's maximum health against their damage type (Physical or Magic) for a brief duration.

name: Precision Protocol
ratio: deals bonus damage and grants bonus Move Speed
rawDesc: Camille's next attack deals bonus damage and grants bonus Move Speed. This spell can be recast for a short period of time, doing significantly increased bonus damage if Camille delays a period of time between the two attacks.

name: Tactical Sweep
ratio: dealing damage
rawDesc: Camille blasts in a cone after a delay, dealing damage. Enemies in the outer half are slowed and take extra damage, while also healing Camille.

name: Hookshot
ratio: Camille pulls herself to a wall, leaping off and knocking up enemy champions upon landing.
rawDesc: Camille pulls herself to a wall, leaping off and knocking up enemy champions upon landing.

name: The Hextech Ultimatum
ratio: deals bonus magic damage to the target with her basic attacks
rawDesc: Camille dashes to target champion, anchoring them to the area. She also deals bonus magic damage to the target with her basic attacks.

name: Serpentine Grace
ratio: All Move Speed bonuses are more effective on Cassiopeia.
rawDesc: All Move Speed bonuses are more effective on Cassiopeia.

name: Noxious Blast
ratio: Cassiopeia blasts an area with Poison after a brief delay, granting her increased Move Speed if she …
rawDesc: Cassiopeia blasts an area with Poison after a brief delay, granting her increased Move Speed if she hits an enemy champion.

name: Miasma
ratio: Cassiopeia releases several clouds of poison, slowing, grounding, and lightly damaging enemies that …
rawDesc: Cassiopeia releases several clouds of poison, slowing, grounding, and lightly damaging enemies that pass through them. Grounded enemies cannot use Movement abilities.

name: Twin Fang
ratio: deals increased damage to Poisoned targets and heals her for a percentage of the damage dealt
rawDesc: Cassiopeia lets loose an attack that deals increased damage to Poisoned targets and heals her for a percentage of the damage dealt. If the target dies from this attack, Cassiopeia regains Mana.

name: Petrifying Gaze
ratio: Cassiopeia releases a swirl of magical energy from her eyes, stunning any enemies in front of her th…
rawDesc: Cassiopeia releases a swirl of magical energy from her eyes, stunning any enemies in front of her that are facing her and slowing any others with their back turned.

rawDesc: Darius's next attack strikes an enemy's crucial artery. As they bleed out, their Move Speed is slowed.

rawDesc: Darius hones his axe, passively causing his physical damage to ignore a percentage of his target's Armor. When activated, Darius sweeps up his enemies with his axe's hook and pulls them to him.

rawDesc: Draven gains his fans' Adoration when he catches a Spinning Axe or kills a minion, monster, or tower. Killing enemy champions grants Draven bonus gold based on how much Adoration he has.

name: Spinning Axe

name: Blood Rush
ratio: Draven gains increased Move Speed and Attack Speed. The Move Speed bonus decreases rapidly over its …
rawDesc: Draven gains increased Move Speed and Attack Speed. The Move Speed bonus decreases rapidly over its duration. Catching a Spinning Axe will refresh the cooldown of Blood Rush.

name: Stand Aside
ratio: dealing physical damage to targets hit and knocking them aside
rawDesc: Draven throws his axes, dealing physical damage to targets hit and knocking them aside. Targets hit are slowed.

rawDesc: Draven hurls two massive axes to deal physical damage to each unit struck. Whirling Death slowly reverses direction and returns to Draven after striking an enemy champion. Draven may also activate this ability while the axes are in flight to cause it to return early. Deals less damage for each unit hit and resets when the axes reverse direction. Executes enemies who have less health than Draven's number of Adoration stacks.

rawDesc: Dr. Mundo resists the first Immobilizing effect that hits him, instead losing Health and dropping a chemical cannister nearby. Dr. Mundo can pick it up by walking over it, restoring Health and reducing this Ability's Cooldown. Dr. Mundo also has significantly increased Health regeneration.

name: Infected Bonesaw
ratio: dealing damage to the first enemy hit based on their current health and slowing them
rawDesc: Dr. Mundo throws an infected bonesaw, dealing damage to the first enemy hit based on their current health and slowing them.

name: Heart Zapper

rawDesc: Dr. Mundo electrocutes himself, dealing persistent damage to nearby enemies and storing a portion of damage he takes. At the end of the duration or on Recast, Dr. Mundo deals a burst of damage to nearby enemies. If the burst hit an enemy, he heals a percentage of the stored damage.

ratio: Dr. Mundo pumps himself with chemicals, instantly healing a percent of his missing Health. He then g…
rawDesc: Dr. Mundo pumps himself with chemicals, instantly healing a percent of his missing Health. He then gains Move Speed and regenerates a portion of his maximum Health over a long duration.

name: Z-Drive Resonance

rawDesc: When out of combat, Evelynn enters Demon Shade. Demon Shade heals Evelynn when she is low on health and grants Camouflage after level 6.

rawDesc: Gangplank signals his ship to bombard an area, slowing and damaging enemies.

rawDesc: Garen gains a burst of Move Speed, breaking free of all slows affecting him. His next attack strikes a vital area of his foe, dealing bonus damage and silencing them.

rawDesc: Garen calls upon the might of Demacia to attempt to execute an enemy champion.

name: A Thousand Cuts

name: Warpath

ratio: Ivern cannot attack or be attacked by non-epic monsters. Ivern can create magical groves on jungle c…
rawDesc: Ivern cannot attack or be attacked by non-epic monsters. Ivern can create magical groves on jungle camps which grow over time. When the grove is fully grown, Ivern may free the monsters to receive gold and experience.

name: Rootcaller
ratio: dealing damage and rooting enemy targets hit
rawDesc: Ivern conjures a vine, dealing damage and rooting enemy targets hit. Ivern's allies can dash to the rooted target.

name: Brushmaker
ratio: deal bonus magic damage
rawDesc: In brush, Ivern and his nearby allies attacks deal bonus magic damage. Ivern can activate this ability to create a patch of brush.

ratio: Ivern places a shield on an ally which explodes after a short duration slowing and damaging enemies.…
rawDesc: Ivern places a shield on an ally which explodes after a short duration slowing and damaging enemies. The shield refreshes if it hits no enemies.

name: Daisy!
ratio: Ivern summons his Sentinel friend Daisy to fight with him. Re-cast command Daisy to attack or move.
rawDesc: Ivern summons his Sentinel friend Daisy to fight with him. Re-cast command Daisy to attack or move.

rawDesc: Janna's allies gain Move Speed moving towards her. Janna deals a portion of bonus Move Speed as bonus magic damage on hit and with Zephyr.

rawDesc: By creating a localized change in pressure and temperature, Janna is able to create a small storm that grows in size with time. She can activate the spell again to release the storm. On release this storm will fly towards the direction it was cast in, dealing damage and knocking away any enemies in its path.

name: Zephyr
ratio: deal damage and slow an enemy's Move Speed
rawDesc: Janna summons an air elemental that passively increases her Move Speed and enables her to pass through units. She may also activate this ability to deal damage and slow an enemy's Move Speed.

name: Eye Of The Storm
ratio: damage and increases their Attack Damage
rawDesc: Janna conjures a defensive gale that shields an ally champion or turret from incoming damage and increases their Attack Damage.

name: Monsoon
ratio: Janna surrounds herself in a magical storm, throwing enemies back. After the storm has settled, soot…
rawDesc: Janna surrounds herself in a magical storm, throwing enemies back. After the storm has settled, soothing winds heal nearby allies while the ability is active.

name: Martial Cadence
ratio: deals bonus physical damage based on their current Health
rawDesc: Jarvan's first basic attack on an enemy deals bonus physical damage based on their current Health. This effect cannot occur again on the same enemy for a few seconds.

name: Dragon Strike
ratio: dealing physical damage and lowering the Armor of enemies in its path
rawDesc: Jarvan IV extends his lance, dealing physical damage and lowering the Armor of enemies in its path. Additionally, this will pull Jarvan to his Demacian Standard, knocking up enemies in his path.

name: Golden Aegis
ratio: Jarvan IV calls upon the ancient kings of Demacia to shield him from harm and slow surrounding enemi…
rawDesc: Jarvan IV calls upon the ancient kings of Demacia to shield him from harm and slow surrounding enemies.

name: Demacian Standard
ratio: deals magic damage on impact and grants Attack Speed to nearby allied champions
rawDesc: Jarvan IV carries the pride of Demacia, passively granting him bonus Attack Speed. Activating Demacian Standard allows Jarvan IV to place a Demacian flag that deals magic damage on impact and grants Attack Speed to nearby allied champions.

name: Cataclysm
ratio: damaged at the moment of impact
rawDesc: Jarvan IV heroically leaps into battle at a target with such force that he terraforms the surrounding area to create an arena around them. Nearby enemies are damaged at the moment of impact.

name: Relentless Assault
ratio: Jax's consecutive basic attacks continuously increase his Attack Speed.
rawDesc: Jax's consecutive basic attacks continuously increase his Attack Speed.

name: Leap Strike
ratio: Jax leaps toward a unit. If they are an enemy, he strikes them with his weapon.
rawDesc: Jax leaps toward a unit. If they are an enemy, he strikes them with his weapon.

name: Empower
ratio: deal additional damage
rawDesc: Jax charges his weapon with energy, causing his next attack to deal additional damage.

name: Counter Strike
ratio: Jax's combat prowess allows him to dodge all incoming attacks for a short duration and then quickly …
rawDesc: Jax's combat prowess allows him to dodge all incoming attacks for a short duration and then quickly counterattack, stunning all surrounding enemies.

name: Grandmaster-at-Arms
ratio: deals additional Magic Damage
rawDesc: Every third consecutive attack deals additional Magic Damage. Additionally, Jax can activate this ability to deal damage around himself and strengthen his resolve, increasing his Armor and Magic Resist for a short duration.

name: Hextech Capacitor
ratio: When Jayce swaps weapons he gains Move Speed for a short duration.
rawDesc: When Jayce swaps weapons he gains Move Speed for a short duration.

name: To the Skies! / Shock Blast
ratio: dealing physical damage and slowing enemies
rawDesc: Hammer Stance: Leaps to an enemy dealing physical damage and slowing enemies. Cannon Stance: Fires an orb of electricity that detonates upon hitting an enemy (or reaching the end of its path) dealing physical damage to all enemies hit.

name: Lightning Field / Hyper Charge
ratio: Hammer Stance: Passive: Restores Mana per strike. Active: Creates a field of lightning damaging near…
rawDesc: Hammer Stance: Passive: Restores Mana per strike. Active: Creates a field of lightning damaging nearby enemies for several seconds. Cannon Stance: Gains a burst of energy, increasing Attack Speed to maximum for several attacks.

name: Thundering Blow / Acceleration Gate
ratio: Deals magic damage to an enemy and knocks them back a short distance
rawDesc: Hammer Stance: Deals magic damage to an enemy and knocks them back a short distance. Cannon Stance: Deploys an Acceleration Gate increasing the Move Speed of all allied champions who pass through it. If Shock Blast is fired through the gate the missile speed, range, and damage will increase.

name: Mercury Cannon / Mercury Hammer
ratio: deals additional magic damage
rawDesc: Hammer Stance: Transforms the Mercury Hammer into the Mercury Cannon gaining new abilities and increased range. The first attack in this form reduces the target's Armor and Magic Resist. Cannon Stance: Transforms the Mercury Cannon into the Mercury Hammer gaining new abilities and increasing Armor and Magic Resist. The first attack in this form deals additional magic damage.

name: Whisper
ratio: deal superior damage
rawDesc: Jhin's hand cannon, Whisper, is a precise instrument designed to deal superior damage. It fires at a fixed rate and carries only four shots. Jhin imbues the final bullet with dark magics to critically strike and deal bonus execute damage. Whenever Whisper crits, it inspires Jhin with a burst of Move Speed.

name: Dancing Grenade
ratio: damage each time it kills
rawDesc: Jhin launches a magical cartridge at an enemy. It can hit up to four targets and gains damage each time it kills.

name: Deadly Flourish
ratio: damaged by Jhin, they are rooted
rawDesc: Jhin brandishes his cane, firing a single shot with incredible range. It pierces through minions and monsters, but stops on the first champion hit. If the target was recently struck by Jhin's allies, lotus traps, or damaged by Jhin, they are rooted.

name: Captive Audience
ratio: dealing damage with an explosion of serrated petals
rawDesc: Jhin places an invisible lotus trap that blooms when walked over. It slows nearby enemies before dealing damage with an explosion of serrated petals. Beauty in Death - When Jhin kills an enemy champion, a lotus trap will bloom near their corpse.

name: Curtain Call
ratio: deals execute damage
rawDesc: Jhin channels, transforming Whisper into a shoulder-mounted mega-cannon. It is able to fire 4 super shots at extreme range that pierce through minions and monsters, but stop on the first champion impacted. Whisper cripples enemies hit, which slows them and deals execute damage. The 4th shot is perfectly crafted, epically powerful, and guaranteed to critically strike.

name: Get Excited!
ratio: Jinx receives massively increased Move Speed and Attack Speed whenever she helps kill or destroy an …
rawDesc: Jinx receives massively increased Move Speed and Attack Speed whenever she helps kill or destroy an enemy champions epic jungle monster, or structure.

name: Switcheroo!
ratio: deal area of effect damage, gain increased range, but drain Mana and attack slower
rawDesc: Jinx modifies her basic attacks by swapping between Pow-Pow, her minigun and Fishbones, her rocket launcher. Attacks with Pow-Pow grant Attack Speed, while attacks with Fishbones deal area of effect damage, gain increased range, but drain Mana and attack slower.

name: Zap!
ratio: deals damage to the first enemy hit, slowing and revealing it
rawDesc: Jinx uses Zapper, her shock pistol, to fire a blast that deals damage to the first enemy hit, slowing and revealing it.

name: Flame Chompers!
ratio: Jinx throws out a line of snare grenades that explode after 5 seconds, lighting enemies on fire. Fla…
rawDesc: Jinx throws out a line of snare grenades that explode after 5 seconds, lighting enemies on fire. Flame Chompers will bite enemy champions who walk over them, rooting them in place.

name: Super Mega Death Rocket!
ratio: damage as it travels
rawDesc: Jinx fires a super rocket across the map that gains damage as it travels. The rocket will explode upon colliding with an enemy champion, dealing damage to it and surrounding enemies based on their missing Health.

name: Second Skin
ratio: dealing increasing bonus magic damage
rawDesc: Kai'Sa's basic attacks stack Plasma, dealing increasing bonus magic damage. Allies' immobilizing effects help stack Plasma. Additionally, Kai'Sa's item purchases upgrade her basic spells to have more powerful properties.

name: Icathian Rain
ratio: Kai'Sa shoots a swarm of missiles that seek out nearby targets. Living Weapon: Icathian Rain is upgr…
rawDesc: Kai'Sa shoots a swarm of missiles that seek out nearby targets. Living Weapon: Icathian Rain is upgraded to shoot more missiles.

name: Void Seeker
ratio: Kai'Sa shoots a long range missile, marking enemies with her passive. Living Weapon: Void Seeker is …
rawDesc: Kai'Sa shoots a long range missile, marking enemies with her passive. Living Weapon: Void Seeker is upgraded to apply more passive marks and reduce cooldown on champion hit.

name: Supercharge
ratio: Kai'Sa briefly increases her Move Speed, then increases her Attack Speed. Living Weapon: Supercharge…
rawDesc: Kai'Sa briefly increases her Move Speed, then increases her Attack Speed. Living Weapon: Supercharge is upgraded to briefly grant Invisibility.

name: Killer Instinct
ratio: Kai'Sa dashes near an enemy champion.
rawDesc: Kai'Sa dashes near an enemy champion.

name: Martial Poise
ratio: Enter a movement command while winding up Kalista's basic attack or Pierce to lunge a short distance…
rawDesc: Enter a movement command while winding up Kalista's basic attack or Pierce to lunge a short distance when she launches her attack.

name: Pierce
ratio: Throw a fast moving spear that passes through enemies it kills.
rawDesc: Throw a fast moving spear that passes through enemies it kills.

name: Sentinel
ratio: damage when Kalista and her Oathsworn strike the same target
rawDesc: Gain bonus damage when Kalista and her Oathsworn strike the same target. Activate to send a soul to scout out the path, revealing the area in front of it.

name: Rend
ratio: dealing escalating damage
rawDesc: Attacks impale their targets with spears. Activate to rip the spears out, slowing and dealing escalating damage.

name: Fate's Call
ratio: Kalista teleports the Oathsworn ally to herself. They gain the ability to dash toward a position, kn…
rawDesc: Kalista teleports the Oathsworn ally to herself. They gain the ability to dash toward a position, knocking enemy champions back.

name: Gathering Fire
ratio: Karma's damaging abilities will reduce the cooldown of Mantra.
rawDesc: Karma's damaging abilities will reduce the cooldown of Mantra.

name: Inner Flame
ratio: deals damage upon hitting an enemy unit
rawDesc: Karma sends forth a ball of spirit energy that explodes and deals damage upon hitting an enemy unit. Mantra Bonus: In addition to the explosion, Mantra increases the destructive power of her Inner Flame, creating a cataclysm which deals damage after a short delay.

name: Focused Resolve
ratio: dealing damage and revealing them
rawDesc: Karma creates a tether between herself and a targeted enemy, dealing damage and revealing them. If the tether is not broken, the enemy will be rooted and damaged again. Mantra Bonus: Karma strengthens the link, healing herself and extending the root duration.

name: Inspire
ratio: damage and increases the Move Speed of the protected ally
rawDesc: Karma summons a protective shield that absorbs incoming damage and increases the Move Speed of the protected ally. Mantra Bonus: Energy radiates out from her target, strengthening the initial shield and applying Inspire to nearby allied champions.

name: Mantra
ratio: Karma empowers her next ability to do an additional effect. Mantra is available at level 1 and does …
rawDesc: Karma empowers her next ability to do an additional effect. Mantra is available at level 1 and does not require a skill point.

name: Death Defied
ratio: Upon dying, Karthus enters a spirit form that allows him to continue casting spells.
rawDesc: Upon dying, Karthus enters a spirit form that allows him to continue casting spells.

name: Lay Waste
ratio: dealing damage to nearby enemies
rawDesc: Karthus unleashes a delayed blast at a location, dealing damage to nearby enemies. Deals increased damage to isolated enemies.

rawDesc: Karthus creates a passable screen of leeching energy. Any enemy units that walk through the screen have their Move Speed and Magic Resist reduced for a period.

name: Defile
ratio: dealing damage to nearby enemies, but quickly draining his own Mana
rawDesc: Karthus passively steals energy from his victims, gaining Mana on each kill. Alternatively, Karthus can surround himself in the souls of his prey, dealing damage to nearby enemies, but quickly draining his own Mana.

name: Requiem
ratio: deals damage to all enemy champions
rawDesc: After channeling for 3 seconds, Karthus deals damage to all enemy champions.

name: Void Stone
ratio: damage and ignores unit collision
rawDesc: Kassadin takes reduced magic damage and ignores unit collision.

rawDesc: Kassadin fires an orb of void energy at a target, dealing damage and interrupting channels. The excess energy forms around himself, granting a temporary shield that absorbs magic damage.

ratio: deal bonus magic damage
rawDesc: Passive: Kassadin's basic attacks deal bonus magic damage. Active: Kassadin's next basic attack deals significant bonus magic damage and restores Mana.

name: Force Pulse
ratio: damage and slow enemies in a cone in front of him
rawDesc: Kassadin draws energy from spells cast in his vicinity. Upon charging up, Kassadin can use Force Pulse to damage and slow enemies in a cone in front of him.

ratio: dealing damage to nearby enemy units
rawDesc: Kassadin teleports to a nearby location dealing damage to nearby enemy units. Multiple Riftwalks in a short period of time cost additional Mana but also deal additional damage.

name: Voracity

name: Bouncing Blade
ratio: Katarina throws a Dagger at the target that then bounces to nearby enemies before ricocheting onto t…
rawDesc: Katarina throws a Dagger at the target that then bounces to nearby enemies before ricocheting onto the ground.

name: Preparation
ratio: Katarina gains a burst of Move Speed, tossing a Dagger into the air directly above herself.
rawDesc: Katarina gains a burst of Move Speed, tossing a Dagger into the air directly above herself.

ratio: Katarina blinks to the target, striking it if its an enemy, or striking the nearest enemy otherwise.
rawDesc: Katarina blinks to the target, striking it if its an enemy, or striking the nearest enemy otherwise.

ratio: dealing massive magic damage while she channels to the 3 nearest enemy champions
rawDesc: Katarina becomes a flurry of blades, dealing massive magic damage while she channels to the 3 nearest enemy champions.

ratio: Kayle's attacks are empowered by the heavens as she levels up and spends skill points. Her wings are…
rawDesc: Kayle's attacks are empowered by the heavens as she levels up and spends skill points. Her wings are lit aflame as she progressively gains Attack Speed, Move Speed, Attack Range, and waves of fire on her attacks.

name: Radiant Blast

rawDesc: Kayle conjures a portal, summoning a celestial sword that pierces through enemies, slowing, damaging, and reducing the resistances of all hit.

ratio: Blessed by the divine, Kayle heals and grants Move Speed to herself and the nearest ally.
rawDesc: Blessed by the divine, Kayle heals and grants Move Speed to herself and the nearest ally.

name: Starfire Spellblade
ratio: deals bonus magic damage to enemies she attacks
rawDesc: Passive: Kayle's celestial sword, Virtue, deals bonus magic damage to enemies she attacks. Active: Kayle's next attack smites her target with celestial fire, dealing bonus damage proportionate to their missing health.

name: Divine Judgment
ratio: Kayle makes an ally invulnerable and calls upon former Aspects of Justice to purify the area around …
rawDesc: Kayle makes an ally invulnerable and calls upon former Aspects of Justice to purify the area around her target with a holy rain of swords.

name: The Darkin Scythe
ratio: damage dealt to champions
rawDesc: Kayn wields an ancient weapon and fights Rhaast, the darkin within it, for control. Either the Darkin will triumph, or Kayn will master Rhaast and become the Shadow Assassin. Darkin: Heal for a percentage of spell damage dealt to champions. Shadow Assassin: For the first few seconds in combat with enemy champions, deal bonus damage.

name: Reaping Slash
ratio: deal damage
rawDesc: Kayn dashes, then slashes. Both deal damage.

name: Blade's Reach
ratio: damages and slows targets in a line
rawDesc: Kayn damages and slows targets in a line.

name: Shadow Step
ratio: Kayn can walk through terrain.
rawDesc: Kayn can walk through terrain.

name: Umbral Trespass
ratio: dealing massive damage when he bursts out
rawDesc: Kayn hides in an enemy's body, dealing massive damage when he bursts out.

name: Mark of the Storm
ratio: Kennen stuns enemies he hits 3 times with his abilities.
rawDesc: Kennen stuns enemies he hits 3 times with his abilities.

name: Thundering Shuriken
ratio: damage and adding a Mark of the Storm to any opponent that it hits
rawDesc: Kennen throws a fast moving shuriken towards a location, causing damage and adding a Mark of the Storm to any opponent that it hits.

name: Electrical Surge
ratio: deals extra damage and adds a Mark of the Storm to his target every few attacks, and he can activate this ability to dam
rawDesc: Kennen passively deals extra damage and adds a Mark of the Storm to his target every few attacks, and he can activate this ability to damage and add another Mark of the Storm to targets who are already marked.

name: Lightning Rush
ratio: Kennen morphs into a lightning form, enabling him to pass through units and apply a Mark of the Stor…
rawDesc: Kennen morphs into a lightning form, enabling him to pass through units and apply a Mark of the Storm. Kennen gains Move Speed when entering this form, and attack speed when leaving it.

name: Slicing Maelstrom
ratio: damage
rawDesc: Kennen summons a storm that strikes at nearby enemy champions for magical damage.

name: Unseen Threat
ratio: deal bonus magic damage and slow them for a few seconds
rawDesc: Nearby enemies that are Isolated from their allies are marked. Kha'Zix's abilities have interactions with Isolated targets. When Kha'Zix is not visible to the enemy team, he gains Unseen Threat, causing his next basic attack against an enemy champion to deal bonus magic damage and slow them for a few seconds.

name: Taste Their Fear
ratio: Deals physical damage to the target
rawDesc: Deals physical damage to the target. Damage increased on Isolated targets. If he chooses to Evolve Reaper Claws, this refunds a percent of it's cooldown against Isolated targets. Kha'Zix also gains increased range on his basic attacks and Taste Their Fear.

name: Void Spike
ratio: deal physical damage to enemies hit
rawDesc: Kha'Zix fires exploding spikes that deal physical damage to enemies hit. Kha'Zix is healed if he is also within the explosion radius. If he chooses to Evolve Spike Racks, Void Spike now fires three spikes in a cone, slow enemies hit, and reveals enemy champions hit for 2 seconds. Isolated targets are slowed for extra.

name: Leap
ratio: dealing physical damage upon landing
rawDesc: Kha'Zix leaps to an area, dealing physical damage upon landing. If he chooses to Evolve Wings, Leap's range increases by 200 and the cooldown resets on champion kill or assist.

name: Void Assault
ratio: Each rank allows Kha'Zix to evolve one of his abilities, giving it a unique additional effect. When …
rawDesc: Each rank allows Kha'Zix to evolve one of his abilities, giving it a unique additional effect. When activated, Kha'Zix becomes Invisible, triggering Unseen Threat and increasing Move Speed. If he chooses to Evolve Adaptive Cloaking, Void Assault gains increased Invisibility duration, and an additional use.

name: Mark of the Kindred
ratio: Kindred can mark targets to Hunt. Successfully completing a Hunt permanently empowers Kindred's basi…
rawDesc: Kindred can mark targets to Hunt. Successfully completing a Hunt permanently empowers Kindred's basic abilities. Every 4 hunts completed also increases Kindred's basic attack range.

name: Dance of Arrows
ratio: Kindred tumbles and shoots up to three arrows at nearby targets.
rawDesc: Kindred tumbles and shoots up to three arrows at nearby targets.

name: Wolf's Frenzy
ratio: Wolf enrages and attacks enemies around him. Lamb passively gains stacks by moving and attacking. Wh…
rawDesc: Wolf enrages and attacks enemies around him. Lamb passively gains stacks by moving and attacking. When fully charged, Lamb's next attack restores health.

name: Mounting Dread
ratio: damage
rawDesc: Lamb fires a carefully placed shot, slowing the target. If Lamb attacks the target two more times, her third attack instead directs Wolf to pounce on the enemy, savaging them for massive damage.

name: Lamb's Respite
ratio: Lamb grants all living things inside a zone a respite from death. Until the effect ends, nothing can…
rawDesc: Lamb grants all living things inside a zone a respite from death. Until the effect ends, nothing can die. At the end, units are healed.

name: Skaarl, the Cowardly Lizard
ratio: damage for him
rawDesc: Kled rides his trusty steed, Skaarl, who takes damage for him. When Skaarl's health depletes, Kled dismounts. While dismounted, Kled's abilities change and he deals less damage to champions. Kled can restore Skaarl's courage by fighting enemies. At maximum courage, Kled remounts with a portion of Skaarl's health.

name: Bear Trap on a Rope
ratio: damages and hooks an enemy champion
rawDesc: Kled throws a bear trap that damages and hooks an enemy champion. If shackled for a short duration, the target takes additional physical damage and is yanked toward Kled. When dismounted, this ability is replaced by Pocket Pistol, a ranged gun blast that knocks back Kled and restores courage.

name: Violent Tendencies
ratio: deals more damage
rawDesc: Kled gains massive attack speed for four attacks. The fourth attack deals more damage.

name: Jousting
ratio: dealing physical damage and gaining a short burst of speed
rawDesc: Kled dashes, dealing physical damage and gaining a short burst of speed. Kled can cast this ability again to dash back through his initial target, dealing the same damage.

name: Chaaaaaaaarge!!!
ratio: Kled and Skaarl charge to a location, leaving a speed-granting trail behind them and gaining a shiel…
rawDesc: Kled and Skaarl charge to a location, leaving a speed-granting trail behind them and gaining a shield. Skaarl locks onto and rams the first enemy champion encountered.

name: Icathian Surprise
ratio: dealing true damage to surrounding enemies
rawDesc: 4 seconds after dying, Kogmaw explodes, dealing true damage to surrounding enemies.

name: Caustic Spittle
ratio: deals magic damage and corrodes the target's armor and magic resist for a short time
rawDesc: Kog'Maw launches a corrosive projectile which deals magic damage and corrodes the target's armor and magic resist for a short time. Kog'Maw also gains additional attack speed.

name: Bio-Arcane Barrage
ratio: deal a percent of the target's maximum health as magic damage
rawDesc: Kog'Maw's attacks gain range and deal a percent of the target's maximum health as magic damage.

name: Void Ooze
ratio: damages all enemies it passes through and leaves a trail which slows enemies who stand on it
rawDesc: Kog'Maw launches a peculiar ooze which damages all enemies it passes through and leaves a trail which slows enemies who stand on it.

name: Living Artillery
ratio: dealing magic damage (increased significantly on low health enemies) and revealing non-stealthed targets
rawDesc: Kog'Maw fires an artillery shell at a great distance dealing magic damage (increased significantly on low health enemies) and revealing non-stealthed targets. Additionally, multiple Living Artilleries in a short period of time cause them to cost additional Mana.

name: Dauntless Instinct
ratio: damage on his next Attack
rawDesc: K'Sante's Abilities mark targets to take more damage on his next Attack. When All Out, K'Sante deals more damage with all Attacks and Abilities.

name: Ntofo Strikes
ratio: K'Sante strikes, damaging and slowing enemies in a short line. On hit, grants a stack of Ntofo Strik…
rawDesc: K'Sante strikes, damaging and slowing enemies in a short line. On hit, grants a stack of Ntofo Strikes. At 2 stacks, K'Sante fires a shockwave that pulls enemies in. When All Out, cooldown is reduced.

name: Path Maker
ratio: damage, then dashes, knocking back and stunning enemies
rawDesc: K'Sante charges up, taking reduced damage, then dashes, knocking back and stunning enemies. When All Out, deals increased damage and no longer knocks back or stuns.

name: Footwork
ratio: K'Sante dashes and gains a shield. If targeting an ally, K'Sante dashes to the ally with increased r…
rawDesc: K'Sante dashes and gains a shield. If targeting an ally, K'Sante dashes to the ally with increased range and both gain a shield. When All Out, cooldown is reduced and speed is increased.

name: All Out
ratio: damage, healing, and transformed abilities at the cost of reduced defenses
rawDesc: K'Sante knocks an enemy back, launching them through any wall in their path. Then, K'Sante goes All Out and dashes after them, gaining increased damage, healing, and transformed abilities at the cost of reduced defenses.

name: Mirror Image
ratio: deals no damage and lasts for up to 8 seconds
rawDesc: When LeBlanc drops below 40% Health, she becomes invisible for 1 second and creates a Mirror Image that deals no damage and lasts for up to 8 seconds.

name: Sigil of Malice
ratio: dealing damage and marking the target for 3
rawDesc: LeBlanc projects a sigil, dealing damage and marking the target for 3.5 seconds. Damaging the marked target with an ability detonates the sigil, dealing additional damage. If either part kills the target, Leblanc refunds the Mana cost and part of this spell's remaining Cooldown.

name: Distortion
ratio: dealing damage to enemies near her destination
rawDesc: LeBlanc dashes to a location, dealing damage to enemies near her destination. For the next 4 seconds, activate Distortion again to return LeBlanc to her starting location.

name: Ethereal Chains
ratio: deals additional damage
rawDesc: LeBlanc launches a chain that shackles the first enemy hit. If the target remains shackled for 1.5 seconds, LeBlanc roots them and deals additional damage.

name: Mimic
ratio: LeBlanc casts a mimicked version of one of her basic spells.
rawDesc: LeBlanc casts a mimicked version of one of her basic spells.

name: Flurry
ratio: After Lee Sin uses an ability, his next 2 basic attacks gain Attack Speed and return Energy.
rawDesc: After Lee Sin uses an ability, his next 2 basic attacks gain Attack Speed and return Energy.

name: Sonic Wave / Resonating Strike
ratio: dealing physical damage to the first enemy it encounters
rawDesc: Sonic Wave: Lee Sin projects a discordant wave of sound to locate his enemies, dealing physical damage to the first enemy it encounters. If Sonic Wave hits, Lee Sin can cast Resonating Strike for the next 3 seconds. Resonating Strike: Lee Sin dashes to the enemy hit by Sonic Wave, dealing physical damage based on the target's missing Health.

name: Safeguard / Iron Will
ratio: damage
rawDesc: Safeguard: Lee Sin rushes to target ally, shielding himself from damage. If the ally is a champion, they are also shielded. After using Safeguard, Lee Sin can cast Iron Will. Iron Will: Lee Sin's intense training allows him to thrive in battle. Lee Sin gains Life Steal and Spell Vamp.

name: Tempest / Cripple
ratio: deals magic damage and reveals enemy units hit
rawDesc: Tempest: Lee Sin smashes the ground, sending out a shockwave that deals magic damage and reveals enemy units hit. If Tempest hits an enemy, Lee Sin can cast cripple. Cripple: Lee Sin cripples nearby enemies damaged by Tempest, reducing their Move Speed. Move Speed recovers gradually over the duration.

name: Dragon's Rage
ratio: dealing physical damage to the target and any enemies they collide with
rawDesc: Lee Sin performs a powerful roundhouse kick launching his target back, dealing physical damage to the target and any enemies they collide with. Enemies the target collides with are knocked into the air for a short duration. This technique was taught to him by Jesse Perring, although Lee Sin does not kick players off the map.

name: Sunlight
ratio: deal damage to those targets, they consume the Sunlight to deal additional magic damage
rawDesc: Damaging spells afflict enemies with Sunlight for 1.5 seconds. When allied Champions deal damage to those targets, they consume the Sunlight to deal additional magic damage.

name: Shield of Daybreak
ratio: dealing bonus magic damage and stunning the target

name: Eclipse

rawDesc: Leona raises her shield to gain Damage Reduction, Armor, and Magic Resist. When the duration first ends, if there are nearby enemies, she will deal magic damage to them and prolong the duration of the effect.

name: Zenith Blade

rawDesc: Sion fires a short range shockwave that damages and slows and reduces the Armor of the first enemy hit. If the shockwave hits a minion or monster, it will be knocked back, damaging, slowing, and reducing the Armor of all enemies that it passes through.

ratio: deals damage and knocks them up based on the distance he has charged
rawDesc: Sion charges in a direction, ramping up speed over time. He can steer his charge slightly with the mouse cursor location. When he collides with an enemy he deals damage and knocks them up based on the distance he has charged.

name: Fleet of Foot
ratio: Sivir gains a short burst of Move Speed when she attacks an enemy champion.
rawDesc: Sivir gains a short burst of Move Speed when she attacks an enemy champion.

ratio: dealing damage each way
rawDesc: Sivir hurls her crossblade like a boomerang, dealing damage each way.

name: Ricochet
ratio: dealing reduced damage while bouncing
rawDesc: Sivir's next few basic attacks gain additional attack speed and bounce to nearby targets, dealing reduced damage while bouncing.

name: Spell Shield
ratio: Creates a magical barrier that blocks a single enemy ability cast on Sivir. She receives health and …
rawDesc: Creates a magical barrier that blocks a single enemy ability cast on Sivir. She receives health and a burst of movement speed if a spell is blocked.

ratio: Sivir leads her allies in battle, granting them a surge of Move Speed for a period of time. In addit…
rawDesc: Sivir leads her allies in battle, granting them a surge of Move Speed for a period of time. In addition, Sivir's attacks reduce her spell cooldowns.

name: Threads of Vibration
ratio: damage over its duration
rawDesc: Skarner's Attacks, Shattered Earth, Upheaval, and Impale, apply Quaking. At max stacks of Quaking, enemies take max Health magic damage over its duration.

ratio: Skarner rips a boulder from the earth that empowers his attacks and can be thrown as a powerful proj…
rawDesc: Skarner rips a boulder from the earth that empowers his attacks and can be thrown as a powerful projectile.

ratio: damages and slows foes
rawDesc: Skarner gains a shield and creates an earthquake whose shockwave damages and slows foes.

ratio: damage and stun them
rawDesc: Skarner charges forward and passes through terrain. If he collides with a champion or large monster, he'll slam them into the next wall he hits to damage and stun them.

name: Impale
ratio: Skarner's tails lash forward to suppress enemy champions. Once suppressed, the victims will be dragg…
rawDesc: Skarner's tails lash forward to suppress enemy champions. Once suppressed, the victims will be dragged along by Skarner as he moves around.

name: Dragon Practice
ratio: damage of Smolders basic Abilities
rawDesc: Hitting champions with Abilities and killing enemies with Super Scorcher Breath grants a stack of Dragon Practice. Stacks increase the damage of Smolders basic Abilities.

rawDesc: Smolder breathes fire on an enemy. As he gains more stacks, this ability becomes more powerful.

rawDesc: Smolder lets out an adorable flaming sneeze that explodes when hitting enemy champions.

ratio: Smolder takes flight ignoring terrain and bombarding the lowest health enemy.
rawDesc: Smolder takes flight ignoring terrain and bombarding the lowest health enemy.

name: MMOOOMMMM!

rawDesc: Smolder calls his mom to breath fire from above, dealing extra damage and slowing enemies in the center of her fire.

name: Power Chord
ratio: deal bonus magic damage in addition to an additional effect based on what basic Ability Sona last activated
rawDesc: Accelerando: Sona gains non-Ultimate ability haste permanently for her basic abilities as she uses her abilities well, up to a cap. Beyond that cap, further successful uses reduce her ultimate's remaining cooldown instead. Power Chord: Every few spell casts, Sona's next attack will deal bonus magic damage in addition to an additional effect based on what basic Ability Sona last activated.

rawDesc: Sona plays the Aria of Perseverance, sending out protective melodies, healing Sona and a nearby wounded ally. Sona gains a temporary aura that grants allies tagged by the zone a temporary shield.

name: Song of Celerity
ratio: Sona plays the Song of Celerity, granting nearby allies bonus Move Speed. Sona gains a temporary aur…
rawDesc: Sona plays the Song of Celerity, granting nearby allies bonus Move Speed. Sona gains a temporary aura that grants allied champions tagged by the zone bonus Move Speed.

name: Crescendo
ratio: dealing magic damage to them
rawDesc: Sona plays her ultimate chord, stunning enemy champions and forcing them to dance and dealing magic damage to them.

name: Salvation
ratio: Soraka runs faster towards nearby low health allies.
rawDesc: Soraka runs faster towards nearby low health allies.

name: Starcall

rawDesc: A star falls from the sky at the target location dealing magic damage and slowing enemies. If an enemy champion is hit by Starcall, Soraka recovers Health.

rawDesc: Soraka sacrifices a portion of her own health to heal another friendly champion.

name: Equinox
ratio: Creates a zone at a location that silences all enemies inside. When the zone expires, all enemies st…
rawDesc: Creates a zone at a location that silences all enemies inside. When the zone expires, all enemies still inside are rooted.

name: Wish
ratio: Soraka fills her allies with hope, instantly restoring health to herself and all allied champions.
rawDesc: Soraka fills her allies with hope, instantly restoring health to herself and all allied champions.

ratio: Swain's ravens collect Soul Fragments that heal him and permanently increase his maximum health.
rawDesc: Swain's ravens collect Soul Fragments that heal him and permanently increase his maximum health.

rawDesc: Swain unleashes several bolts of eldritch power that pierce through enemies. Enemies hit take more damage for each bolt they are struck by.

name: Vision of Empire
ratio: deals damage and slows enemies
rawDesc: Swain opens a demon eye that deals damage and slows enemies. Champions hit are revealed and also grant Swain a Soul Fragment.

ratio: Swain launches a wave of demonic power forward. It then returns to Swain and roots enemies it hits. …
rawDesc: Swain launches a wave of demonic power forward. It then returns to Swain and roots enemies it hits. Swain can then choose to pull all rooted champions closer. This ability has a shorter cooldown during Demonic Ascension.

name: Demonic Ascension
ratio: Swain transforms into a demon and drains health from nearby enemy champions, minions, and neutral mo…
rawDesc: Swain transforms into a demon and drains health from nearby enemy champions, minions, and neutral monsters. Swain can cast Demonflare to decimate and slow nearby enemies with a nova of soulfire. This form is indefinite as long as Swain drains enemy champions.

ratio: dealing bonus magic damage to enemies hit
rawDesc: After casting a spell, Sylas stores a charge of Petricite Burst. Sylas's basic attacks will expend a charge and whirl his energized chains around him dealing bonus magic damage to enemies hit. While Sylas has a charge of Petricite Burst, he gains attack speed.

name: Chain Lash
ratio: dealing damage to and slowing enemies
rawDesc: Sylas lashes his chains out, intersecting at his targeted location dealing damage to and slowing enemies. After a delay, magical energy explodes from the intersection point dealing damage.

name: Kingslayer
ratio: dealing damage and healing himself against enemy champions
rawDesc: Sylas lunges at an enemy with magical force dealing damage and healing himself against enemy champions.

name: Abscond / Abduct
ratio: Sylas dashes to a location. Sylas can recast the ability to throw his chains out, pulling himself to…
rawDesc: Sylas dashes to a location. Sylas can recast the ability to throw his chains out, pulling himself to an enemy he hits.

name: Hijack
ratio: Sylas steals the enemy's ultimate ability and can cast it freely.
rawDesc: Sylas steals the enemy's ultimate ability and can cast it freely.

name: Transcendent
ratio: damage
rawDesc: Syndra collects Splinters of Wrath from gaining levels and damaging enemies which upgrade her abilities. Dark Sphere: Syndra can hold an additional charge Force of Will: Bonus true damage. Scatter the Weak: Increased width and slows all targets Unleashed Power: Executes low health targets

rawDesc: Syndra conjures a Dark Sphere dealing magic damage. The sphere remains and can be manipulated by her other powers.

ratio: dealing magic damage and slowing the Move Speed of enemies

rawDesc: Syndra knocks enemies and Dark Spheres back dealing magic damage. Enemies hit by Dark Spheres become stunned.

rawDesc: Syndra bombards an enemy Champion with all of her Dark Spheres.

rawDesc: Tahm Kench puts the heft of his immense body behind his attacks, gaining extra damage based on his total health. Damaging enemy champions builds stacks of An Acquired Taste. At three stacks, he can use Devour on an enemy champion.

name: Tongue Lash
ratio: Tahm Kench lashes out with his tongue, damaging and slowing the first unit hit and healing himself i…
rawDesc: Tahm Kench lashes out with his tongue, damaging and slowing the first unit hit and healing himself if he strikes an enemy champion. Applies a stack of An Acquired Taste to enemy champions. If the champion already has 3 stacks of An Acquired Taste, they are stunned and the stacks are consumed.

name: Abyssal Dive
ratio: Dive down and then re-appear at target location, damaging and knocking up all enemies in an area.
rawDesc: Dive down and then re-appear at target location, damaging and knocking up all enemies in an area.

ratio: damage he takes and heals based on it while out of combat
rawDesc: Passive: Tahm Kench stores a percent of the damage he takes and heals based on it while out of combat. Active: Convert all stored damage into a temporary shield.

name: Devour
ratio: dealing magic damage if they are an enemy, or shielding them if they are an ally
rawDesc: Tahm Kench devours a champion for a few seconds, dealing magic damage if they are an enemy, or shielding them if they are an ally.

name: Rock Surfing
ratio: Taliyah gains Move Speed near walls.
rawDesc: Taliyah gains Move Speed near walls.

name: Threaded Volley
ratio: Taliyah throws a volley of rocks in a target direction, moving freely as she casts. This creates Wor…
rawDesc: Taliyah throws a volley of rocks in a target direction, moving freely as she casts. This creates Worked Ground below her. If Taliyah casts Threaded Volley on Worked Ground, she consumes the ground to throw a stronger boulder that slows enemies.

name: Seismic Shove
ratio: Taliyah causes an area of ground to erupt and throws enemies within it in a direction of her choosin…
rawDesc: Taliyah causes an area of ground to erupt and throws enemies within it in a direction of her choosing.

ratio: Taliyah creates a slowing minefield. If enemies dash through it or are knocked through it, the mines…
rawDesc: Taliyah creates a slowing minefield. If enemies dash through it or are knocked through it, the mines explode and stun them.

name: Weaver's Wall
ratio: Taliyah creates a very long wall and then surfs it.
rawDesc: Taliyah creates a very long wall and then surfs it.

ratio: damage over time
rawDesc: Talon's spells Wound champions and large monsters, stacking up to 3 times. When Talon attacks a champion with 3 stacks of Wound, they bleed for heavy damage over time.

rawDesc: Talon stabs the target unit. If they are within melee range, this attack deals critical damage. If they are outside melee range, Talon will leap at his target before stabbing them. Talon refunds some health and cooldown if this ability kills the target.

rawDesc: Talon sends out a volley of daggers that then return back to him, dealing physical damage every time it passes through an enemy. The returning blades deal bonus damage and slow units hit.

rawDesc: Talon vaults over any terrain or structure, up to a max distance. This ability has a low cooldown, but puts the used terrain on a long cooldown.

ratio: Heals nearby allied champions based on charges stored. Bravado-empowered attacks grant a charge of S…
rawDesc: Heals nearby allied champions based on charges stored. Bravado-empowered attacks grant a charge of Starlight's Touch.
