ratio: Passively increase the Armor of Taric and any allied champion with Bastion. Actively shields an ally…
rawDesc: Passively increase the Armor of Taric and any allied champion with Bastion. Actively shields an ally and grants them Bastion for as long as they remain near Taric. Taric's spells also cast off the ally with Bastion.

name: Dazzle
ratio: deals magic damage and stuns enemies
rawDesc: Taric readies a beam of starlight that, after a brief delay, deals magic damage and stuns enemies.

ratio: If Teemo stands still and takes no actions for a short duration, he becomes Invisible indefinitely. …
rawDesc: If Teemo stands still and takes no actions for a short duration, he becomes Invisible indefinitely. If he's in brush, Teemo can enter and maintain his Invisibility while moving. After leaving Invisibility, Teemo gains the Element of Surprise, increasing his Attack Speed for a few seconds.

rawDesc: Obscures an enemy's vision with a powerful venom, dealing damage to the target unit and blinding it for the duration.

rawDesc: Each of Teemo's attacks will poison the target, dealing damage on impact and each second after for 4 seconds.

ratio: Teemo throws an explosive poisonous trap using one of the mushrooms stored in his pack. If an enemy …

name: Damnation
ratio: Thresh can harvest the souls of enemies that die near him, permanently granting him Armor and Abilit…

ratio: damage

rawDesc: Tristana fires her weapon rapidly, increasing her Attack Speed for a short time.

rawDesc: When an enemy unit dies near Trundle, he heals for a percent of its maximum Health.

rawDesc: Trundle turns target location into his domain, gaining Attack Speed, Move Speed, and increased healing from all sources while on it.

ratio: Tryndamere gains Fury for each attack, critical strike, and killing blow he makes. Fury passively in…

ratio: Damage as he is more and more wounded

ratio: dealing damage to enemies in his path
rawDesc: Tryndamere slices toward a target unit, dealing damage to enemies in his path.

ratio: Tryndamere's lust for battle becomes so strong that he is unable to die, no matter how wounded he be…
rawDesc: Tryndamere's lust for battle becomes so strong that he is unable to die, no matter how wounded he becomes.

name: Loaded Dice
ratio: Upon killing a unit, Twisted Fate rolls his 'lucky' dice receiving 1 to 6 bonus gold.
rawDesc: Upon killing a unit, Twisted Fate rolls his 'lucky' dice receiving 1 to 6 bonus gold.

name: Wild Cards
ratio: dealing damage to each enemy unit they pass through
rawDesc: Twisted Fate throws three cards, dealing damage to each enemy unit they pass through.

rawDesc: Twisted Fate chooses a magic card from his deck, and uses that for his next attack, causing bonus effects.

ratio: deals bonus damage

name: Deadly Venom
ratio: dealing true damage each second

rawDesc: Twitch hurls a cask of venom that explodes in an area, slowing targets and applying deadly venom to the target.

rawDesc: Twitch wreaks further havoc on poisoned enemies with a blast of his vile diseases.

name: Wilding Claw

rawDesc: Udyr gains a shield and his next two attacks heal him. Recast: Gain an even bigger shield and heal based on max health over the next couple seconds.

name: Blazing Stampede
ratio: Udyr gains movement speed and his first attack against each target will Stun them. Recast: Gain even…
rawDesc: Udyr gains movement speed and his first attack against each target will Stun them. Recast: Gain even more movement speed and immunity to immobilizing effects for a couple seconds.

name: Echoing Flames

name: Disdain
ratio: Urgot charges in a direction, shielding himself and trampling non-champion enemies. If he catches an…

name: Living Vengeance

name: Night Hunter
ratio: Vayne ruthlessly hunts evil-doers, gaining Move Speed when moving toward nearby enemy champions.
rawDesc: Vayne ruthlessly hunts evil-doers, gaining Move Speed when moving toward nearby enemy champions.

ratio: deals bonus damage

rawDesc: Readying herself for an epic confrontation, Vayne gains increased Attack Damage, Invisibility during Tumble, reduced Tumble cooldown, and more bonus Move Speed from Night Hunter

rawDesc: Veigar is the greatest Evil to ever strike at the hearts of Runeterra - and he's only getting bigger! Striking an enemy Champion with a spell or scoring a takedown grants Veigar permanently increased Ability Power.

name: Baleful Strike

name: Dark Matter

rawDesc: Veigar twists the edges of space, creating a cage that Stuns enemies that pass through.

name: Primordial Burst

rawDesc: Vel'Koz causes an area to explode, knocking up enemies, and knocking close enemies slightly away.

name: Mistral Bolt

He replaces their Ultimate with a free cast of his own.

rawDesc: Viego's spectral blade passively deals bonus percent current Health damage On-Hit and strikes twice vs. enemies he recently hit with an Ability, stealing Health. Viego can activate this Ability to thrust his zweihander forward, impaling enemies in front of him.

ratio: Viego charges up before dashing forward, releasing a ball of concentrated Black Mist that stuns the …
rawDesc: Viego charges up before dashing forward, releasing a ball of concentrated Black Mist that stuns the first enemy hit.

rawDesc: Viktor blasts an enemy unit with magic damage, which grants him a shield and empowers his next basic attack. Augment: Siphon Power's shield is increased by 60% and Viktor gains bonus move speed after casting the Ability.

Augment: The Arcane Storm moves 25% faster, and whenever champions die after taking damage from it, the storm grows and increases in its duration.

rawDesc: Vladimir sinks into a pool of blood, becoming untargetable for 2 seconds. Additionally, enemies on the pool are slowed and Vladimir siphons life from them.

name: Tides of Blood
ratio: deals damage in the area around him but can be blocked by enemy units

rawDesc: Warwick lunges forward and bites his target, dealing damage based on their maximum health and healing for damage dealt.

rawDesc: Xayah throws two damaging daggers that also drop Feathers she can recall.

rawDesc: Xayah creates a storm of blades that increase her Attack Speed and damage while also granting her Move Speed if she attacks a champion.

rawDesc: Xayah calls back all her dropped Feathers dealing damage and rooting enemies.

ratio: Xerath's basic attacks periodically restore Mana. Whenever Xerath kills a unit, this cooldown is red…
rawDesc: Xerath's basic attacks periodically restore Mana. Whenever Xerath kills a unit, this cooldown is reduced.

ratio: dealing magic damage to all targets hit
rawDesc: Fires a long-range beam of energy, dealing magic damage to all targets hit.

ratio: Yuumi dashes to a target ally, becoming untargetable from everything except turrets. While on her Be…

Each bloblet has a percentage of Zac's maximum Health, Armor and Magic Resistance. This ability has a 5 minute cooldown.

rawDesc: Zac explodes outward towards nearby enemies, dealing a percentage of their maximum health as magic damage.

rawDesc: Zac attaches his arms to the ground and stretches back, launching himself forward.

rawDesc: Zac bounces four times, knocking up enemies hit and slowing them.

rawDesc: Zilean can prepare himself for future confrontations, reducing the cooldowns of his other basic abilities.
